article_title: Nigerian Oil Group Secures $1.2 Billion to Develop Wells
article_text:
IBADAN, Nigeria--The state-run Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation has secured $1.2 billion to drill wells offshore and onshore under a joint venture with Chevron Nigeria, the NNPC said Sunday.

The multi-year package is designed to help the federal government pay its joint venture partners and is being financed by a consortium led by Standard Chartered Bank and United Bank for Africa, according to a statement.
